description:
Responsibilities:- Assist pharmacists in dispensing medications to patients- Prepare medication orders by compounding, packaging, and labeling pharmaceuticals- Maintain inventory of medications and supplies- Perform data entry tasks to update patient records and prescription information- Answer phone calls and respond to inquiries from patients and healthcare professionals- Provide excellent customer service and ensure patient satisfaction- Adhere to all pharmacy policies and procedures
Skills:- Strong attention to detail and accuracy in medication preparation- Excellent organizational skills to maintain inventory and track medication orders- Proficient computer skills for data entry and record keeping- Effective communication skills to interact with patients and healthcare professionals- Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment and prioritize tasks accordingly- Knowledge of pharmaceutical terminology, drug classifications, and dosage forms
Filware software knowledge considered as a strong asset.
